Enetcloud Fully Managed Clustered VPS | Free Domain,Exchange Reseller,Free Migration



Hello,

We are pleased to announce our new FUlly Managed Clustered VPS Servers with a FREE DOMAIN & Free Mail Exchange Reseller Account. This is a promotion with only limited VPS slots available including a FREE DOMAIN account of worth $12. As you may or may not know uptime is one of our core focuses and as you can see we practice what we preach, You can start with starter VPS and seamlessly upgrade to a larger VPS with no downtime as needed or just add resources on fly. We hope to see you join the growing Enetcloud Hosting family!

Start Providing CLUSTERED HOSTING TODAY !!!along with Exchange Hosting !!!!!

>>>>>>>>>>Microsoft Exchange 2010 Reseller Account Details<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

Features
  • Full MS Exchange 2010 Offering

Much Much More...






All VPS’s include the following:

  • Redundant Server Hardware that is Proactively Monitored for Hardware and Network Health
  • RAID10 Disk Arrays. Disk IO is never a concern
  • Upgrade or Downgrade your VPS Server Seamlessly
  • Highly Redundant and Powerful Juniper based Network
  • Optional Multi-Gig internal LAN network for very fast CDP backup and recovery service. Alternatively, utilize our multi-GIG LAN network to accomplish Load Balancing between VPS Servers (powered by Citrix Netscaler Load Balancers)
  • 100% Network and Server Uptime SLA
  • Console or Remote Desktop access directly from your control panel
  • Cost effectively Back Up your all of your data to our CDP SAN farm utilitizing CDP by R1Soft (Supported Operating Systems only)
  • Redundant Server Hardware that is Proactively Monitored for Hardware and Network Health


*cPanel, DirectAdmin, have additional fees on top of the monthly prices below. http://enetcloud.com/vps_hosting.php


New to the VPS market? We have tons of customers who switch to us from shared/reseller hosting so we give you all the information you need to get your VPS up and running. Consider us your outsourced sys admins as we are here 24/7 to assist you.

Worried about security? By default we optimize and secure each VPS and All Fully Managed Clustered VPS have Fully Managed Firewall ..




For additional information, or to view our additional products and services, please visit www.enetcloud.com; chat live with a sales rep or email us anytime at sales@enetcloud.com
